body:
In fact, my full GOPATH is apparently an extremely expensive load thanks to lots of cgo use. After fixing those errors it took 2 minutes for my laptop to produce the next error. This is not the sort of work oracle should be doing just to determine if an exported symbol is referenced in a package:

```
vim-go: /Users/crawshaw/Dropbox/src/github.com/go-gl/glfw/v3.0/glfw/clipboard.go:4:10: fatal error: 'GLFW/glfw3.h' file not found
#include <GLFW/glfw3.h>
```
